title: so riot, are you EVER going to fix this sion bug?
body:
its been going on since his rework, if he buys a Tiamat, and uses it, he has no animation, its really clunky and annoying to play with, and I doubt its a bug that's that hard to fix either. 

to recreate it, go into a game as sion, buy Tiamat, use its active.

replies.body: I thought it was because Sion has very slow animations on everything and can cancel out the known animation canceling machine that used to be riven beloved{{item:3077}} but now an ex.
